name: A Date with Death (itch)
description:
You are the last member of the human army, if you fall, humanity shall perish.

So you can't die.

Seriously you can't.

Stop it.

=========== CONTROLS ===========

  • WASD to move.
  • Mouse to aim and Left mouse button to shoot
  • Left Shift to sprint.

(Also if you think the game is very hard, consider saying no when Death asks to revive you ^_^ )

=========== ABOUT ==============

Short game ~5 minutes.

The game is a mix of top down shooter and a very weird dating sim where you can charm Death by staying with him.

Multiple endings.

Made for Wowie Jam 3.0

"Failure is progress" > The more you fail the easier the game gets. (Also you can progress the relationship with Death)
"Let's mess with the concepts of winning and losing" > Both winning and losing have their own gameplay loops, will you succeed first try on purposely off yourself to be with Death?

================================

NOTE: Both versions are the exact same, the only difference is some compression in the audio files that were taking 80% of the executable file.
I leave the uncompressed version because that was the one submitted before the deadline.
